name: War Builder
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

In this creative game you can build a war using different materials like Infantry Units, Vehicles, Aircrafts, Buildings, Defence, multiple Animation Effects + Backgrounds and WAR sounds to create your perfect war ambience. Place so many materials as you wish, to create your war ambience. It is also a kind of brain twister game that allows you to test your logical skills and strategy thinking. Become a real General and designer of your own unique war.

Product Features:

-high quality graphics
-many materials (more coming soon)
-architect and designer skills
-animation effects
-war sounds
-many backgrounds
-no ads
